alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 25 at 10:02AM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Henry IL, Rock Island and Whiteside Counties. Rock River at Moline affecting Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening. && ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...From Monday morning to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Water affects some summer cottages along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - &&
